extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is running runc version 1.1.11 or earlier to determine if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running runc version 1.1.11 or earlier?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade runc to Version 1.1.12
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade runc to version 1.1.12 to apply patches for the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Technologies Incorporating runc
extracted_playbook.description: Update all technologies and container runtimes that incorporate runc to their latest patched versions.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow Vendor Advisories
extracted_playbook.description: Follow vendor advisories and apply updates for container hosting services and infrastructure to ensure all components are secure.
